events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specialized in software roles has been assigned to your application and will be in touch soon.
We conducted an initial screening of your resume and are impressed with your experience in software engineering.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC with our engineering lead.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the feedback highlights your strong problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and the team is enthusiastic about your potential fit within the engineering department.
An official offer has been proposed, including detailed information about salary, benefits, and start date.
We have received your positive feedback on the offer and your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new software engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun, including setup of all necessary development tools and introductions to the team.
The hiring process is now complete, and we officially welcome you to the engineering department with full access granted.
